duties_responsibilities.duty: Work closely with internal and external business partners to deliver an exceptional customer experience aligned with business goals.
Support all day-to-day facets of highly complex and integrated digital product delivery, including creative, business, and technical requirements.
Coordinate with core Subject Matter Experts (SMEs) to ensure product scoping, quality assurance, and compliance with established standards.
Passionate about the customer and capable of working in a fast-paced environment.
Manage and run agile scrum ceremonies, gather requirements and goals necessary to provide developers the information they need to build effective solutions.

education_certification.credential: Bachelor's degree in Computer Science, Engineering, Business, or related field (Master's preferred)
